    PolicyEdge

    We rely on a combination of staff, local expertise, and software to keep track of the latest developments in local city council’s, planning departments, and municipalities. Upon signing up, we are ready to help you by providing background research on your issue and neighboring cities, monitoring for suggested search words, and active alerts of any new pending legislation. We can cast a wide net or a spotlight on city government to find information pertinent to your industry, depending on your needs.
